title: STAT+: The AI industry wants to turn the routine mammogram into a powerful multitool
description: A new generation of AI algorithms aim to go beyond detecting cancers to predicting risk for cardiovascular diseases.
content: A new generation of AI algorithms aim to go beyond detecting cancers to predicting risk for cardiovascular diseases.
